item.title: 中国在达沃斯保持低调姿态以争取西方投资
item.description: 中国今年在达沃斯采取的低调姿态与美国截然不同，一些商界领袖表示，北京有望从特朗普政府与欧洲在格陵兰问题上的冲突中获益。【原文：China's low-key approach in Davos this year could not have been more different to that of the United States, with some business leaders saying Beijing stands to benefit from the Trump administration's clash with Europe over Greenland.】

item.title: 第一公民银行集团股价下跌，因其年度利息收入预测令人失望
item.description: 第一公民银行集团周五公布的全年利息收入低于华尔街预期，导致这家地区性银行股价下跌逾9%。【原文：First Citizens BancShares projected full-year interest income below Wall Street expectations on Friday, sending shares of the ​regional lender down more than 9%.】

item.title: 加州就重启萨布尔输油管道起诉特朗普政府
item.description: 加利福尼亚州总检察长周五表示，该州正起诉特朗普政府，因其宣称对两条州内输油管道拥有联邦管辖权，并允许塞伯尔海上公司重启通过这些管道输送石油的作业。【原文：California's attorney general on Friday said the state was suing the Trump administration for asserting federal authority over two state pipelines and permitting Sable Offshore to restart pumping oil through them.】

item.title: 特斯拉在美国和加拿大市场取消自动驾驶功能，转向全自动驾驶订阅模式
item.description: 特斯拉周四在美国和加拿大市场停产其基础级驾驶辅助系统"自动驾驶辅助"，旨在推动客户升级至更高级的"完全自动驾驶（监督模式）"技术。【原文：Tesla on Thursday discontinued its basic driver-assistance system, Autopilot, in Canada and the U.S., in an attempt to push customers toward a more advanced version of the technology branded as Full Self-Driving (Supervised).】

item.title: Meta在全球范围内暂停青少年访问AI虚拟角色
item.description: Meta Platforms周五表示，将暂停全球所有应用中青少年用户对现有AI角色的访问权限，同时为青少年用户开发新版AI角色。【原文：Meta Platforms said on Friday it will suspend teenagers' access to its existing AI characters across all of its apps worldwide, as it builds an updated iteration of those for teen users.】

item.title: 丰田因显示屏故障将在美国召回约16.2万辆汽车
item.description: 丰田汽车周五表示，因多媒体显示屏存在缺陷，正在美国召回约16.2万辆汽车。【原文：Toyota said on Friday that it was conducting a safety recall involving around 162,000 vehicles in the United States over a faulty multimedia display.】

item.title: 消息人士称，巴西警方在涉及Banco Master银行的调查中锁定里约养老基金
item.description: 三名消息人士向路透社透露，巴西联邦警察周五对里约热内卢州养老基金执行了搜查和扣押令，这是与贷款机构Banco Master倒闭相关的最新进展。【原文：Brazil's federal police on Friday served search and seizure ​warrants against Rio de Janeiro state's pension fund in the ‌latest development tied to the collapse of lender Banco Master, three sources told Reuters.】

item.title: 建筑科技公司EquipmentShare在纳斯达克强势上市，估值突破70亿美元
item.description: EquipmentShare.com股票周五在纳斯达克首日上市即大涨16.3%，使这家工程设备租赁公司的市值达到71.6亿美元。【原文：EquipmentShare.com shares rose 16.3% in their Nasdaq debut on ​Friday, valuing the construction rental firm ‌at $7.16 billion.】

item.title: 中国科技股被视为对冲美元风险的工具，市场关注企业盈利与美联储动向
item.description: 瑞银基金经理本周在瑞士达沃斯向路透社表示，在中国经济周期性背景下，较低的估值、政府支持以及宽松的财政政策正鼓励投资者转向科技股，并分散投资于美国以外的地区。【原文：Lower valuations, government support and loose fiscal policy set against a cyclical backdrop in China is encouraging investors to rotate into ​technology and diversify away from the U.S., UBS fund managers told Reuters this ‌week in Davos, Switzerland.】

item.title: 美国如何控制伊拉克石油收入
item.description: 自2003年入侵伊拉克以来，美国便对该国石油收入美元实施着有效控制，使华盛顿在巴格达事务中拥有非凡影响力，这对涉及伊朗的地区局势产生了深远影响。【原文：The United States, since its 2003 invasion of Iraq, has held effective control over the country's oil revenue dollars, giving Washington extraordinary leverage over Baghdad's affairs, with implications for regional dynamics involving Iran.】

item.title: 在SEC寻求法院批准送达传票后，阿达尼集团旗下公司市值蒸发125亿美元
item.description: 印度阿达尼集团旗下公司周五市值蒸发125亿美元，此前美国市场监管机构向法院申请协助向创始人高塔姆·阿达尼及集团高管萨加尔·阿达尼送达传票，指控其涉嫌欺诈及2.65亿美元贿赂案。【原文：India's Adani group firms shed $12.5 billion in market cap on Friday, after a U.S. markets regulator asked a court for help in serving summonses upon founder Gautam Adani and group executive Sagar Adani over alleged fraud and a $265 million bribery scheme.】

item.title: 巴西速溶咖啡行业寻求澄清美国维持50%关税的决定
item.description: 巴西商业协会向路透社透露，该国速溶咖啡行业正寻求了解详情，以弄清为何其产品仍面临50%的美国关税，尽管美国已取消了对该南美国家其他咖啡出口产品的大部分进口关税。【原文：Brazil's instant coffee industry is seeking details on why it continues to face a 50% U.S. tariff, even after import charges were lifted on most of the South American country's other coffee exports, business associations told Reuters.】

item.title: 参议员称国会必须调查TikTok交易，批评缺乏细节
item.description: 民主党参议员埃德·马基周五表示，国会应调查TikTok中国母公司字节跳动达成的一项协议。该协议旨在建立一家美国控股的合资企业，以确保美国数据安全，从而避免美国禁止这款社交媒体应用。【原文：Democratic Senator Ed Markey said on Friday Congress should investigate a deal by TikTok's Chinese owner ByteDance to establish a majority American-owned joint venture that would secure U.S. data in a bid to avoid a U.S. ban on the social media app.】

item.title: 法官驳回DoorDash和优步阻止纽约市小费法规的申请
item.description: 联邦法官驳回了DoorDash和优步科技公司要求颁布禁令的请求，该禁令旨在阻止纽约市实施一项法律。该法律要求外卖应用程序在顾客付款时提供向配送员支付小费的选项。【原文：A federal judge rejected DoorDash's and Uber Technologies' request for an injunction to block New York City laws that would require food delivery apps to provide customers an option to tip delivery workers when paying.】

item.title: 美国油田服务公司斯伦贝谢表示，其可在短期内大幅提升在委内瑞拉的业务规模。
item.description: 美国油田服务公司斯伦贝谢周五表示，只要具备适当的许可、安全参数和合规措施，该公司就能迅速扩大在委内瑞拉的业务活动。【原文：U.S. oilfield service company SLB said on Friday it can rapidly increase its activities in Venezuela, provided the appropriate licensing, safety parameters and compliance measures are in place.】

item.title: 美国股票基金因地缘政治担忧遭遇资金外流
item.description: 截至1月21日当周，美国股票基金遭遇资金外流，因投资者担忧特朗普总统就格陵兰问题对欧洲国家发出的关税威胁而降低风险敞口。【原文：U.S. equity funds faced outflows in the week through January 21 as investors reduced risk ​exposure on concerns about President Donald Trump's tariff threats ‌against European nations over Greenland.】

item.title: 美国消费者信心指数1月份有所改善
item.description: 美国消费者信心在1月份全面改善，但对高物价和劳动力市场的担忧依然存在，周五公布的一项调查显示。【原文：U.S. consumer sentiment improved across the board in January, though concerns about high ​prices and the labor market lingered, a ‌survey showed on Friday.】

item.title: 全球股市资金流入放缓，因地缘政治不确定性
item.description: 截至1月21日当周，全球股票基金投资规模出现萎缩，因美国总统特朗普威胁重启与欧洲的格陵兰岛贸易争端，抑制了投资者的风险偏好。【原文：Investments in global equity funds shrank in the week to January 21 as U.S. President Donald Trump's threats of reigniting a trade dispute with Europe over Greenland curbed investor appetite.】

item.title: "就业、就业、就业"——达沃斯论坛上，随着担忧情绪退居次席，人工智能成为新的口号
item.description: 刺骨的寒冷、政治紧张局势以及对人工智能的疑虑，都未能浇灭达沃斯商界领袖们对技术创造就业机会的热情。【原文：Biting cold, political tensions and doubts about artificial intelligence did nothing to curb the enthusiasm of business leaders in Davos over technology's ability to create jobs.】

item.title: 美国1月商业活动保持稳定；价格压力持续存在
item.description: 美国1月份商业活动保持平稳，调查显示，新订单的改善被疲软的劳动力市场和企业对进口关税导致成本上升的持续担忧所抵消。【原文：U.S. business activity was steady in January as an improvement in new orders was ​offset by a lackluster labor market and lingering concerns among firms over higher costs because of ‌import tariffs, a survey showed on Friday.】

item.title: 据消息人士称，特朗普政府解雇了其部门曾禁止中国车辆的官员
item.description: 据知情人士透露，特朗普政府已撤换一名商务部官员，该官员的部门曾以国家安全为由，实质上禁止了几乎所有中国汽车进入美国市场。【原文：The Trump administration has pushed out a Commerce Department official whose office effectively barred nearly all Chinese cars from the U.S. market for national security reasons, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 欧盟将暂停对美930亿欧元报复性贸易措施六个月
item.description: 欧盟委员会周五表示，将提议再暂停六个月针对美国的价值930亿欧元（1091.9亿美元）的欧盟报复性贸易措施，这些措施原定于2月7日启动。【原文：The European Commission said on Friday it would propose suspending for another six months an ​EU package of retaliatory trade measures against the ‌U.S. worth 93 billion euros ($109.19 billion) that would otherwise kick in on February 7.】

item.title: 诺沃制药的Wegovy减肥药首周处方量达18,410份，开局表现令人鼓舞
item.description: 据分析师援引IQVIA数据显示，诺和诺德的口服减肥药Wegovy在美国上市后的首个完整周内，开具处方达18,410次，为该类口服减肥药市场开局带来积极信号。【原文：Novo Nordisk's Wegovy pill was prescribed 18,410 times in the U.S. in the first full week after its launch in an encouraging ​start to the oral weight-loss drug race, according to analysts that cited IQVIA data.】

item.title: 据彭博社报道，瑞银正为部分私人银行客户探索加密货币投资业务。
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周五报道，瑞银集团正计划向部分私人银行客户提供加密货币投资选项，消息人士透露了这一情况。【原文：UBS is planning to offer cryptocurrency investment options to some private banking clients, Bloomberg ​News reported on Friday, citing people familiar ‌with the matter.】

item.title: SLB季度利润超预期，计划向股东返还40亿美元
item.description: SLB周五公布的第四季度利润超出华尔街预期，这家全球领先的油田服务公司受益于收购ChampionX，并宣布今年将向股东返还40亿美元。【原文：SLB beat Wall Street estimates for fourth-quarter profit on Friday, as the world's top oilfield services provider benefited ​from the ChampionX acquisition and unveiled plans to return $4 billion ‌to shareholders this year.】

item.title: 晨间竞价：我的反弹有多绿色？
item.description: 迈克·多兰和ROI团队本周末最期待阅读、观看和收听的内容。【原文：Everything Mike Dolan and the ROI team are excited to read, watch and listen to over the weekend.】

item.title: 独家：消息人士称花旗集团将于三月裁员更多员工
item.description: 据两位知情人士透露，花旗集团在3月份预计将裁减更多员工，此前该集团本月已裁减约1000个岗位。【原文：Citigroup is expected to lay off more employees in March following a round of about 1,000 job cuts this month, according to two sources with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 美国股指期货下跌，英特尔股价暴跌，地缘政治担忧持续发酵
item.description: 美国股市期货周五走低，预示标普500指数和纳斯达克指数将连续第二周下跌。英特尔因业绩预期不及预期导致股价暴跌，而持续的地缘政治紧张局势也令市场情绪承压。【原文：U.S. stock futures dipped on Friday, signaling ​a second consecutive week of declines for the S&P 500 and Nasdaq, as Intel's shares ‌plunged after disappointing forecasts, while lingering geopolitical tensions weighed on sentiment.】

item.title: 英国调查Meta公司对WhatsApp数据请求的合规情况
item.description: 英国通信监管机构Ofcom周五表示，已就Meta Platforms在某项市场审查中提供的WhatsApp相关信息展开调查。【原文：British regulator Ofcom said on Friday it had opened an investigation into Meta Platforms over the information it had provided relating to WhatsApp for one of its market reviews.】

item.title: 联想首席财务官表示，公司正寻求与多个AI模型建立合作关系
item.description: 联想首席财务官表示，该公司正寻求与全球多家大型语言模型建立合作关系，为其设备提供支持，旨在确立其作为全球人工智能参与者的地位。【原文：Lenovo is seeking partnerships with multiple large language models around the world to power its devices as it aims to establish itself as a global AI player, the company's chief financial officer said.】
